basic_information.scholarship_name: Kato Buss Outstanding Student in Theatre Performance Award-NOMINATION

description: This scholarship was established in 2015 to honor the professional achievements of Kato Buss, associate professor of theatre arts and chair of the UCO Theatre Arts Department. During his career, Dr. Buss has distinguished himself by championing the success of minority students as theatre performers, breaking common stereotypes in directing and acting. This scholarship honors his creativity as a director and educator and benefits a minority student who excels in theatre performance. Eligibility Minority student Excels in theatre performance Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
